sql-script.name: script
sql-script.tran-sql: create table simple_account ( id bigint not null, password varchar(32), status tinyint not null, createdate datetime not null, lastlogindate datetime not null, lastloginip varchar(24), login bit not null, logintimes int not null, onlinemillis bigint not null, mailbinding bit, mobilebinding bit, blacklist bit, exp int, points int, reputation int, money int, skin varchar(16), theme varchar(16), primary key(id) );

create table simple_account_log ( id bigint not null, accountid bigint not null, eventid varchar(32) not null, createdate datetime not null, exp int, points int, reputation int, money int, logid bigint, description varchar(256), primary key(id) );

create table simple_account_view_log ( id bigint not null, accountid bigint not null, viewid bigint not null, vtype tinyint not null, createdate datetime not null, lastupdate datetime, unique (accountid, viewid, vtype), primary key(id) );

create table simple_user ( id bigint not null, name varchar(32) not null, departmentid int not null, text varchar(32), status tinyint not null, sex varchar(2), birthday date, blood varchar(8), hometown varchar(32), email varchar(32), homephone varchar(16), officephone varchar(16), mobile varchar(16), address varchar(256), postcode varchar(8), qq varchar(16), msn varchar(16), description varchar(256), signature varchar(256), homepage varchar(128), oorder bigint not null, primary key(id), unique (name), unique (email), unique (mobile) );

create table simple_department ( id bigint not null, parentid bigint not null, name varchar(32) not null, text varchar(32) not null, description varchar(256), oorder bigint not null, primary key(id), unique (name), unique (parentid, text) );

create table simple_chart ( id bigint not null, departmentid bigint, name varchar(32) not null, text varchar(32) not null, description varchar(256), oorder bigint not null, primary key(id), unique (name), unique (departmentid, text) );

create table simple_job ( id bigint not null, jobchartid bigint not null, parentid bigint not null, name varchar(32) not null, text varchar(32) not null, jobtype tinyint not null, rulehandle varchar(64), rulescript text, description varchar(256), oorder bigint not null, primary key(id), unique (name), unique (jobchartid, text) );

create table simple_job_member ( jobid bigint not null, membertype tinyint not null, memberid bigint not null, primaryjob bit not null, description varchar(256), unique (jobid, membertype, memberid) );
